attributes.action: bring private rents int line with social and council housing rents
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: there are not enough social and council properties available for people who need them.private landlords charge way above the odds for their properties leaving people who cannot obtain mortgages paying more for private rent than they would if they had a mortgage. this cannot be right or fair during such difficult financial times.private lanlords are profiteering from peoples misfortune and that should be stopped. bring the private rents into line with council proprty rents and give the people who have to rent a level playing field.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
